column8: at the ren. villa nursing home in renville. funeral services will be held on thursday
column11: at 1:00 p. m. at the zion united methodist church in danube. the rev. dean nosek will officiate. burial will be in fairview cemetery in renville. visitation will be thursday from noon until the 1:00 p. m. service at the church in danube. arrangements with dirks-blem funeral service
column13: mn. rose daugherty was born on february 16
column15: on the family farm in crooks township
column16: renville county to hilko and rose (rubbie) hinderks. she grew up on her family's farm north of renville and attended country school. she was united in marriage to dale daugherty on april 17
column19: they farmed north of renville and raised their family. rose was a member of the united methodist church in renville and was active and faithful member of the united methodist women. she loved gardening and growing flowers
column23: and playing the organ. rose also loved to go fishing
column24: and she still went ice fishing at the age of 80. survivors include her two sons: eldon (and la. vonne) of montevideo
column25: and kenneth (and pat) of menahga; her six grandchildren
column29: and other relatives and friends. she was preceded in death by her parents
